column1:
Population living below income poverty line, PPP $1.90 a day (%)
SDG 1.1 By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day
Dimension: Poverty
Definition: Percentage of the population living below the international poverty line of $1.90 (in purchasing power parity terms [PPP] ) a day.
Source: World Bank (2019a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. Http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed 21 June 2019.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Data refer to the most recent year available during the period specified.
